channel.title: PLEASE HELP! Link the registration on your forums to your private server?
channel.description: [size=10pt][b]How do I link the registration on my forums to my private server so no one can log in without registering there username and password. By the way if it helps I have mySQL and I host. By the way I have a deltascape source. Thanks! -Jim[/b][/size]
